tool.name: PathOGiST - Consensus Clustering
tool.description: : Performs consensus clustering on multiple clusterings

param.name: distances
param.label: Distance Matrices
param.help: File contains paths to distance matrices for different clusterings

param.name: clusterings
param.label: Clusterings
param.help: File contains paths to clusterings (matrices or lists of clustering assignments)

param.name: fine_clusterings
param.label: Fine Clusterings
param.help: File contains names of the clusterings which are the finest

param.name: constraints
param.label: All constraints
param.help: Add all constraints to the optimization problem, not just those with mixed signs
